702013f-a.title: Bronx: Walton Avenue - 164th Street (East)
702013f-a.text:
Walton Ave., west side, north from East 164th Street.
About 1927.
Ewing Gallowav.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

700197f-a.title: Bronx: 164th Street (East) - Walton Avenue
700197f-a.text:
E. 164th Street, at the northeast corner of 'alton Avende, showing
the All Hallows Institute, seen from Joyce Filmer Park.
Between the Institute and the steal skeleton o f a new building
on the right is a narrow clearance, the former Butternut Street,
now no longer used as a thoroughfare.
P. L. Sperr  April 1O, 1941
NO RPPRODUCTIDN8
